climatePledgeFriendly.details: Global Recycled Standard (GRS) verifies the percentage of recycled content and tracks it from the source to the final product.

features: Big is Beautiful - This plus size winter coat for women is made available in different modern and stunning colors. Choose from size 1X to 5X to ensure a custom, comfy, and figure-flattering fit, and show off your classic taste in clothing by sporting this women's zip-up long puffer jacket.

A Warm Embrace - Plus size parka jackets for women use soft 240 grams of imitation down cotton padding and skin-friendly pongee liner. This women's warm winter jacket is made with a pure durable shell having a DWR finish and PU membrane, adding an adjustable detachable hood with vegan fur trim, fleece-lined hand pockets, elastic waist, and snap-button cuffs. Every detail is exquisitely designed to make you enjoy winter.

100% Recycled Waterproof Fabric- Our winter jackets for women are made with recycled polyester, which requires far fewer resources than new fibers and generates fewer CO2 emissions. The shell fabric with a 3,000mm waterproof rating effectively keeps out light rain. Stay protected no matter where your adventures take you with our warm puffy coat.

Protects Against Wind - This oversize winter parka for women is designed with full front zippers, a button placket, and adjustable features, you can customize the fit of your removable hood, hem, and cuffs to keep you safe from the elements. This winter coat for women is made with a detachable hood and fur lining, elastic waist, snap-button cuffs, DWR finish, and PU membrane. Get yourself more stylish with the hooded puffer jacket on meanwhile shield against cold air as a thick snow jacket.

Fashion Jacket That Lasts - This quilted puffer jacket is tailored using heavy-duty buttons and zippers that can be secured without a hitch. Tighten the waist-invisible drawstring of the women's long parka for a better, lets you adjust your silhouette as you, please. This windproof women's padded puffy coat has 6 pockets that keep essentials like phones or passports within reach.
body.description: Wear Heavy & Bulky Winter Coats By Wantdo Let's face it, the first thing you think of when you hear the words "women's winter coats" is the familiar sight of bright green or neon yellow coats they rent out in the Alps. There's not much to look forward to beyond staying warm. Engineered to keep you warm without sacrificing style, these Wantdo winter jackets boast superior heat retention while flaunting a form that flatters your silhouette. No woman wants or deserves to be seen in anything less than functional and stylish. This is a reliable winter jackets for women in chilly days. 100% Recycled Shell Fabric and Insulation - Made with recycled materials, the winter coat provides excellent warmth for its weight and reduces carbon emissions. Waterproof Protection - With a waterproof rating of 3000mm, the winter jacket for women is designed to keep you dry in even the wettest conditions, making it the perfect choice for outdoor adventures. Stay protected no matter where your adventures take you with this winter jacket with a hood. This women's winter jacket with soft and skin-friendly lining provides a warm and cozy feeling of your body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice wintercoat!!!
reviews.reviewText: This winter coat is stylish, fits well not too snug and not overly puffy. Warm,Hood can be taken off, fur on hood is nice. .Very happy with this coat!!! Thank you!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the Navy coat one size up to accommodate a bulky sweater or coat. The hoodie. That was the right move. The coat is a comfortable length, a tad shorter than standard "car coat" length. I feel warm as toast when I wear it. The faux fur is a bit cheesy but I'm still brushing it smooth. This was a smart purchase. I can snap it closed or use the zipper for especially cold days. Definitely waterproof. Love the look and feel of this outerwear and I will definitely repurchase in another color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: This coat is awesome! I bought this coat for a recent trip to Maine in January 😅. I am from Oklahoma & was worried about my other coats not cutting it. I can’t saw enough good things about this coat. Excellent quality, kept me toasty, wasn’t too bulky or heavy, & it was cute. I tested it on the bay all day & during the night. Weather was mainly 28F to 12F. Kept me warm the whole time. Several of my Maine friends even asked where I got it & asked me to send them the link 😎 Maine approved. I’m a curvy girl & the fit was great. I usually wear a 16-18 & I got a 4x ( I could have sized down, but I wanted an oversized look). The adjustable waist made it easy to cinch in if you wanted oversized with a little more structure/shape. Hood is big & a little floppy which I prefer. I wear a lot of high messy buns in my hair & it fit perfectly. 10/10 Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really warm even in the arms but runs small
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is well made and looks great. It is very warm even in the arms. The only problem is that it runs small. It also is not lengthy by any means. It won't cover your bum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alaska Tested & Approved!
reviews.reviewText: I took this coat to Alaska & it was perfect. The overall feel of this coat was great from the time I unboxed it! It’s thick without being too bulky and is perfectly weighted. My only complaint is that there aren’t any pockets that go in at an angle for your hands but there’s plenty of pockets overall. It did get rained on a little and it repelled it nicely. Overall, I would definitely recommend this coat! I sized up just to be on the safe side with my trip being less than 3 days from time of order but this product does fit true to size so you’ll be fine ordering your regular size. I’m hoping they make the pants to match because I love this coat lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The pro: color is pretty, I got the green, its comfortable standing up, and stylish, has a high neck , removable hood I have big arms and has plenty of room Cons: sleeves are s bit long and the shoulder area is bulky, I do not mind. when I sit down I can only snap the middle snap I am 5'7 230 lbs ordered the 3 X and does not fit around my legs I have to leave that open . Other than some bulkiness I am still happy with my purchase it keeps me warm is the main thing lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Could be improved
reviews.reviewText: The jacket keeps you warm. BUT the hoodie is way too big. It won't stay put even if you button it. It keeps falling over your face. Also, the main zipper is a horrible design. It sucks. It is already starting to rip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fits perfectly and keeps me warm.

reviews.reviewText: Love this jacket! Hood just needs a bit of fluffing when comjng out of the bag, but this is perfect for Canadian winter ❤️
Perfect for cold days and I am exposed to cold blustery days. Price was great. I did have to go to a size bigger
This jacket is very lovely. The fit is perfect. I have had alot of compliments on it

Likely warm but sounded like a plastic bag when you move. lined with a plastic type layer to stop heat leak and protect against wind. fit weird on me. Bought an Arctic north at twice the price and fits like a glove and no noise.

Super beau !! pas lourd mais très chaud j’adore la coupe il est parfait mais d’habitude je prend du 2x et là pour être sûr j’ai pris un 4 x un poil grand mais avec un gros Cotton ouater c super je peut bien bouger dedans pas serrer du tout ! Je recommande vivement
